content.raw: There's a "discard old builds" config option that should probably be used. In general the recommendation is not to save very old builds as their use is quite limited. For this job in particular the log really only needs to last long enough for us to debug issues with it so keeping an extremely low number of builds, the last 7 days' worth, or a combination of both seems reasonable to me as an outsider.
